body.name: Miyoo Mini Plus Handheld Game Console 3.5 inch Miyoo-Mini+ Portable Retro Video Games Consoles Pocket Rechargeable Hand Held Classic System Purple Transparent 128GB
body.stockDetail: Only 15 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 11 mins
features: Supports 9300+ Classic Games: Works for dozens of emulators, covers many types of games, such as adventure, shooting, action, racing, etc. Just take out of box to play.
Clear Bright Screen: 3.5-inch display and 640x480 resolution, you can see more details and beautiful scenes in the game.
Fun Multiplayer Features: An upgraded online game module lets you play games with friends, kids, and family.
Rechargeable Built-in Battery: Equipped with great efficient LiPo battery 3000mAh, just charge and play.

On The Go Design: Small and lite style body design, ultra-compact size, it is very convenient whether you carry it with you during business trips, travel or camping. Recall the dream of the games anytime, anywhere.
Customized Simple System: Equipped with an optimized system with higher stability and effective running speed, which including save & load game, favorite and recent folder function etc.
Package Including: 1x Miyoo-mini+ Purple Transparent 128GB, 1x Portable Case, 1x Screen Protector, 1x USB-C Charging Cable, 1x TF-card Reader, 1x Manual.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 159 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really do enjoy this pocket-sized gamer. It has so many games, its going to take a long time to get through it all! Not to mention, that it also does more than game! This is an awesome little device. It seems to be alright with its construction and doesnt feel super cheap, its a little small and its hard to play for hours and hours but sitting at an office or on a lunch break, its perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome way to play lots of retro games
reviews.reviewText: Great build quality and screen, clickybuttons with a nice screen protector to protect the panel, which is vivid with bright colors and excellent clarity. Battery life lasts around 4 hours. Shiny buttons add a great pop of color, love the feel in my hands, like a classic gameboy with a great screen, plays loads of game consoles and comes with tons of ROMs preinstalled. I love the form factor and small size, being able to run up to N64 games on a pocketable device for such a low price with great build quality is awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This little dude is amazing.
reviews.reviewText: I can’t believe how good this little handheld is. The little guy can play tons of games with no issues even PlayStation 1 games which blew my mind twisted metal 4 played with no issues. I originally got this for my nephew but I want one now. I will mention this though if you have large hands like me I wear size xl gloves this is not going to be very comfy for you to play for an extended period of time. With that said it is a really nice little handheld and I’m sure my nephew is going to love it. I did have one little issue had usb-c port for charging broke while I was trying to plug it in to charge. I contacted the supplier and they sent me another one thankfully. I’m still going to order another one because the thing plays so well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like it. The selection of games is awesome really all I need and all I want. Great for quick sessions if you find yourself with nothing to do

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tons of games to play!
reviews.reviewText: I got this as the cheaper alternative to buying a Gameboy and games for it. And so far, so good! My favorites have been the Hamtaro and Disney games. It fits well enough in my hands and the screen only glitches now and then, so overall I'm impressed and I like it. I would recommend for anyone looking to play retro games!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Don't waste money buying the option with more storage, the sd card it comes with is garbage. Buy a quality sd card immediately (I bought a Samsung Select 128GB). Otherwise I'm absolutely loving this thing. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Came just as described. I did have an issue with the display at first. It would flicker, so i contemplated returning it but it stopped after a day. I’ve been playing the old Pokémon games for over a month now and have never experienced an issue. Love taking this everywhere

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Handheld for Retro Gaming
reviews.reviewText: This is a great handheld for retro gaming. It's well made, and easy to set up. Buttons are comfortable, and we'll placed. Only thing it's really missing is Bluetooth for headphones. You'll need a 3.5mm jack headset. Highly recommend.

The product description said it comes with a travel case but mine didn't come with one. The SD card it came with was junk and needed to be replaced with a quality one. For these reasons I removed a star. Otherwise, throw Onion OS on it and it's a great handheld to keep me entertained when traveling.
Ceci étais un cadeau pour mon frère, et il a aimé !

reviews.reviewTitle: Después de un mes ya dejo de funcionar
reviews.reviewText: La consola tiene buenos materiales y es muy práctica para salir con ella, sin embargo al mes de uso dejo de reconocer los juegos, primero fueron los de SNES y una semana después todos los roms de los demás sistemas. Revise si es por algún error en la tarjeta micro SD pero no, el problema es la consola que ya no la reconoce.

Not sure what the problem is when people refer to the quality of the screen. It looks great!It included a screen protector (good luck centering this sucker!), carry case, SD to USB adapter, and 64GB card.The card comes preloaded with a pile of games for each system.I do recommend upgrading to the OnionOS, as it's a lot more sensible.Though, it is no slouch the way it ships!

I really love this device because it brings so much Nostalgia to your life. I grew up playing Spyro and Crash Bandicoot on the PS2, so being able to play those games brings back so many memories I love it. The only thing I am upset about is that I can't save any of my games... I have to start from scratch if I want to play a game... I'm really confused as to why I need to go onto my computer to delete files so that I can save my content.
